column1: Uchi////Based on the review I read
column2: three of us went to Uchi around 5:30pm on Friday night. But the host told us need one and half an hour. Then we put our name and walk around. You know
column3: we are raving for food. Do you think it will a good idea try some other food before go to Uchi? Then we went to Aladdin
column4: finished two plates of food and came back. Our reservation was ready!
